definition: point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: Coriolis acceleration is a nodus in general mechanics.

sentences.english: Jura in re aliana is a major difficulty in the making of China's jus in rem.
sentences.chinese: 他物权为我国物权法制定中的最大难点。

sentences.english: The difficulties with CSR come when companies get it out of proportion.
sentences.chinese: 难点在于很多公司在对于社会职责的安排不合比例。

sentences.english: The excavation of inclined shaft was always difficult in the construction of Pumped-Storage Power Station.

sentences.english: Endoresment after date has been a difficult point in note theory.

sentences.english: It is a difficult issue to explore new mode of learning assessment in web-based environment.

sentences.english: The near-synonym discrimination plays an important role in English learning.
sentences.chinese: 近义词辨别在英语学习中是不可忽视的重点和难点。

sentences.english: Synopsis:This paper analyzes problems encountered in the manufacture of billet mould shell.
sentences.chinese: 分析小方坯结晶器外壳制造中遇到的难点问题。

sentences.english: The problem of pollution bearrived the focus of public attention.
sentences.chinese: 污染重难点型成了公众关注的焦点。

sentences.english: Sand making core of turbine blade for aluminum alloy is more difficult.

sentences.english: Word Sense Disambiguation (WSD) has always been a difficult and hot points in natural language processing.

sentences.english: The judgment of transitive binary relation is a difficult point in discrete mathematic.
sentences.chinese: 可传递二元关系的判定是离散数学中的一个难点。

sentences.english: Wang Hongcheng thinks, compensating for a standard is adjudicative difficulty all the time surely really.
sentences.chinese: 王宏丞则认为，赔偿标准的确定一直是判决难点。

sentences.english: It is difficult for mined tunnel with shallow cover to cross water-rich sand stratum.

sentences.english: What is more, parenthesis is difficult for foreign students to study spoken Chinese.

definition: important point/main point/focus/key (project etc)/to focus on/to put the emphasis on
to recount (e.g. results of election)/to re-evaluate
to settle (a dispute)/to resolve/to solve/to dispose of/to dispatch
of the utmost importance/of highest priority
